description:
When it comes to touring, ski mountaineering, or racing, a light gear is crucial to moving quickly. These superlight crampons really take that to heart. Using a burly webbing linking system instead of a standard bar, they create an ultra-packable, lightweight system that folds up small when not in use. The 3-piece construction is highly adjustable, allowing you to shift the middle points toward the toe or heel depending on your preference or boot size. Need them even lighter? Remove the antiballing systems and the middle rails to drop these below 300g a pair.

  • Aluminum front, mid and heel pieces keep the weight low
  • Ultralight 40mm UHMWPE and HTPE webbing replaces the standard linkage bars
  • Micro-adjustment dial on heel lever tunes the fit
  • TPU antiballing plate on each segment
  • Multiple toe bail positions let you customize the fit for different boots
  • Includes automatic toe bail and semi-auto toe basket
  • Storage bag included
name: Blue Ice Harfang Tour Aluminum Crampon
